game.title: Interstellar: Pixel Odyssey
game.summary: Embark on a pixelated journey through space and time to save humanity. Explore distant planets, solve puzzles, and navigate the complexities of love, survival, and sacrifice.
game.world_setting: The pixelated world of Interstellar: Pixel Odyssey captures the essence of the movie in a 2D format. Players will visit Earth in a state of decay, traverse the vastness of space to reach the wormhole near Saturn, and land on Miller's planet and Mann's planet. The haunting beauty of Gargantua and the mind-bending tesseract provide a backdrop for the player's journey through themes of time dilation, love, and the ultimate quest for survival.

main_character.name: Cooper
main_character.visual_description: Wearing a worn astronaut suit with earth-toned colors and a helmet adorned with scratches from space travel.

characters.name: Dr. Amelia Brand
characters.visual_description: Wearing a sleek white spacesuit with a high-tech helmet.
dialogue: I'm here to help. Make sure to stop by!

characters.name: CASE
characters.visual_description: A robotic assistant with various mechanical arms for repairs.
dialogue: I'm here to help. Make sure to stop by!

characters.name: Dr. Mann
characters.visual_description: A deceptive figure in a rugged astronaut suit with a sly expression.

characters.name: TARS
characters.visual_description: A quirky robot with a blocky design and a humorous personality.
dialogue: I am working, please excuse me.

characters.name: Murph
characters.visual_description: A determined young girl in tattered Earth clothes, holding a cryptic message.

skills.name: Zero-G Maneuvering
skills.effect: Allows the player to navigate space obstacles with precision.

skills.name: Emergency Landing
skills.effect: Enables the player to make a safe landing in critical situations.

skills.name: Planetary Analysis
skills.effect: Provides insights into the unique characteristics of each planet.

skills.name: Time Dilation Awareness
skills.effect: Allows the player to understand and utilize time dilation for strategic advantages.

skills.name: Mechanical Repair
skills.effect: Enables the player to fix damaged equipment and ships.

skills.name: Robotic Assistance
skills.effect: Summons a robotic assistant for additional support during missions.

skills.name: Resource Scavenging
skills.effect: Allows the player to find valuable resources in harsh environments.

skills.name: Advanced First Aid
skills.effect: Enhances the player's ability to heal injuries and survive dangerous situations.

weapons.name: Plasma Rifle
weapons.description: A high-tech energy weapon that emits powerful plasma bolts, capable of melting through enemy armor.

weapons.name: Gravity Hammer
weapons.description: A massive weapon that harnesses gravitational forces to crush enemies with immense force.

weapons.name: Temporal Disruptor
weapons.description: A device that manipulates time waves to create temporal disruptions, slowing down or freezing enemies in their tracks.

weapons.name: Nanotech Blade
weapons.description: A blade infused with nanotechnology that can self-repair and adapt to different combat scenarios, dealing precise cuts and strikes.

cutscenes.title: Earth's Last Stand
cutscenes.description: Cooper and Murph witness the worsening conditions on Earth as they struggle to find a solution to save humanity.

dialogue.speaker: Cooper
dialogue.line: We can't give up, Murph. There has to be a way to save us all.

dialogue.speaker: Murph
dialogue.line: I believe in you, Dad. We'll find a way together.

cutscenes.title: Journey to the Wormhole
cutscenes.description: Cooper, Dr. Amelia Brand, and TARS embark on a daring journey through space to reach the wormhole near Saturn.

dialogue.speaker: Dr. Amelia Brand
dialogue.line: The fate of humanity rests on this mission. We must not fail.

dialogue.speaker: TARS
dialogue.line: Calculating optimal trajectory for wormhole entry. Hold on tight, Cooper.

cutscenes.title: Miller's Planet Dilemma
cutscenes.description: Cooper, Dr. Amelia Brand, and CASE face the time dilation challenge on Miller's planet while searching for a solution.

dialogue.speaker: Cooper
dialogue.line: Time is not on our side here. We need to make every moment count.

dialogue.speaker: CASE
dialogue.line: Analyzing the effects of time dilation on our mission parameters. We must adapt quickly.
